document.full_text: iran's nuclear envoy said on friday it would be a "strategic mistake" to build atom bombs, dismissing what a leading western expert cited as evidence suggesting tehran was seeking the means to do just that.
document.title: iran says nuclear bomb would be "strategic mistake"
lines_and_colors: iran's nuclear envoy said on friday it would be a "strategic mistake" to build atom bombs, dismissing what a leading western expert cited as evidence suggesting tehran was seeking the means to do just that.
